entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor of Defensive Magical Theory who is being stared at by Hermione. (Excerpt: 'She was staring fixedly at Professor Umbridge with her hand in the air.')

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Student who is trying to catch Professor Umbridge's eye and is being watched by others. (Excerpt: 'Harry could not remember Hermione ever neglecting to read when instructed to...')

relationships.description: Hermione is staring at Professor Umbridge. (Excerpt: 'She was staring fixedly at Professor Umbridge with her hand in the air.')

Professor Umbridge is being stared at by Hermione and others. (Excerpt: 'The chapter they had been instructed to read was so tedious that more and more people were choosing to watch Hermione’s mute attempt to catch Professor Umbridge’s eye...')
